Options: A. Gregor Mendel##B. Charles Darwin##C. Professor Oak##D. Bill the Pokémaniac

needle: Professor Oak is renowned in the Pokémon world for his extensive research on Pokémon and their relationships with humans.
title: Pokemon
rule_content:
Professor Oak is renowned in the Pokémon world for his extensive research on Pokémon and their relationships with humans. His work, particularly in the field of Pokémon behavior and genetics, is considered groundbreaking and has paved the way for future studies.
In the world of Pokémon, teleportation is a known phenomenon, with Psychic-type Pokémon like Abra having the ability to teleport themselves and others instantly to different locations. This mode of transportation would drastically reduce travel time and has the potential to revolutionize city travel.
Pidgey, known as the Tiny Bird Pokémon, has been used traditionally in the Pokémon world for carrying messages over long distances. Their remarkable homing instinct ensures that they can deliver mail to any location without error, an invaluable service for communication in remote areas.
In the Pokémon universe, Dragonite is known for its incredible speed and ability to fly. The Dragonite express delivery service would take advantage of these traits to transport goods quickly and efficiently across great distances, revolutionizing logistics in the Pokémon world.
Castform is a Weather Pokémon that has the unique ability to transform its appearance based on the current weather conditions. In the Pokémon world, Castform's transformations can predict weather changes, providing a natural and reliable method of weather forecasting.
Garbodor, the Trash Heap Pokémon, consumes garbage, which allows it to grow and evolve. Utilizing Garbodor in urban areas for waste processing could potentially offer a biological solution to managing and reducing waste in the Pokémon world.
In the Pokémon universe, the Pokédex is an electronic device designed to catalog and provide information regarding the various species of Pokémon. It is considered the most comprehensive source of knowledge on Pokémon biodiversity, constantly updated with new discoveries by trainers around the world.
In Pokémon, a Chansey is known for its healing abilities and often helps treat Pokémon in Pokémon Centers.
Jenny is a symbol of law enforcement in the Pokémon world, often handling public issues.
An Ice Beam from a Pokémon like Articuno could freeze and preserve food effectively.
Canalave City's library holds a vast collection of the world's history in the Pokémon universe.
Pikachu can generate electricity, making it useful for power restoration in the Pokémon world.
Sunny Day is a move that stimulates sunlight, which can enhance photosynthesis and crop growth in the Pokémon world.
Lapras is known for ferrying people over water in the Pokémon world.
Dragonite is often depicted as a rescue Pokémon due to its intelligence and flight ability.
Defog is a move that clears obstacles, including potentially air pollutants, in Pokémon games.
Full Restore is a Pokémon item that cures any ailment, including a Pokémon's equivalent of a cold.
Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon, making it a practical example of electricity in the Pokémon world.
Scyther, a Bug-type Pokémon, could hypothetically manage pests in crops in the Pokémon world.
Castform's form changes with the weather, hence it's used for predictions in Pokémon.

## A final note about the language used

Lastly, it's important to remember that Natural Lanugage Processing was made possible through its close relation with linguistics. Therefore, when you formulate a question, take into consideration the complexity of the language used and avoid making it too long or complex the question will likely be ignored or the response will be out of context.

### Importance of Asking the Right Question

High-level: Bottom-line first. Ask for a specific piece of information. Phase out trivia.

Low-level: reduce wordiness.

Question density

Once you've filtered the desired information that needs to be extracted, don't make the question too long. See the second example from this page, where the question "which airline flight should I take from New York (NYC) to Seattle" was changes to "which flight should I take from NYC to Seattle?". With less information for the AI to sift through, a more accurate response might be yielded. Those who have used ChatGPT may have noticed that the AI developed a tendency to ramble on for more than a paragraph and present superfluous trivia during the last weeks. From our experience, directing it with the correct language increases your chances of receiving an accurate response.

Semantic Weighting

There is an added importance to the words contained in the question towards the begging and the end of the phrase.

The end is very important because if the computer only comprehends the last phrase, it will still provide an answer that may not be as accurate to the whole question but it will still be more relevant than random text.

However, containing keywords at the start of the sentence makes it possible for the AI to comprehend more general questions, questions that may deviate from the focus of the wanted information, and even allow for the computer to recognize sarcasms.a

Some results might depends on this weighting as well as on the clarity of the question.

AI Safety and context: The conversation context or history is important for several reasons.

First, it allows the AI model to understand the previous dialogue and use that information to provide a more accurate response. For instance, if you start a conversation with the chatbot by introducing yourself and your interests, the chatbot can use that information to respond more appropriately to your questions and comments.

Second, it allows the AI model to remember information from previous conversations and use that information to respond to new questions. This is particularly useful when answering questions that require multiple steps or require information from multiple conversations.

Lastly, storing previous conversations helps the AI model learn from user feedback and improve its responses over time. This allows the AI model to adapt to your specific needs and preferences, providing a more personalized experience.

Note

Questions should be structured in a certain way and will be more likely to produce the desired output. Be sure to test different formulations and evaluate their performance!

## Evaluation

There are several ways to quantify the performance of a LLMs.2

### Entropy

The higher the entropy the less confident an AI response is. Entropy could mean a more interesting texting partner or more difficult to talk to, depending on the context.

#### Alignment Sanity Check (ASC)

• Checks for unaligned output
• AI aligns output to input through continued prompting until output matches input.

title: Harry_Potter
rule_content:
Hedwig is a pet who acts as a messenger for Harry Potter.
Time-turner is a device for Time travel that looks like an hourglass on a gold necklace. The number of times the hourglass is turned represents the number of hours in time.
Felix Felicis is one of the strangest little potions, a lucky potion that will bring you good luck. Making it is very complicated, and if you get it wrong, the consequences are catastrophic. But if you cook it right, like in this crucible, you'll find that whatever you do will work -- before the effects wear off. If taken in excess, it can lead to dizziness, recklessness and arrogance
When cast on your opponent during a duel, their wand flies into your hand and obeys you. It glows red when emitted with a wand.
After seeing the warning sign of Hogwarts, if Muggles must approach the place, they will suddenly remember something urgent that they must do immediately and leave.
Certain staircases at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, such as the Grand Staircase, are enchanted to change shape and direction at random intervals, making it difficult to predict where each step leads.
Typically, regular invisibility cloaks are made from demiguise fur or are ordinary cloaks that have been enchanted with a disappearing spell. However, these cloaks tend to lose their effectiveness over time. Only the Cloak of Invisibility from the Deathly Hallows can provide permanent and uninterrupted invisibility.
If the injury is more serious, the student needs to be taken to St. Mungo's Hospital for Magical Injuries and illnesses for further treatment. In 1996, Katie Bell was cursed after touching an opal necklace and was rushed to St Mungo's Hospital.
The Blasting Curse can blow up everything it touches, and it's so dangerous that misuse can be fatal.
The entrance to Gryffindor Tower, located on the eighth floor of the castle, behind the portrait of the Fat Lady. To get in, you have to give the correct code to the portrait. Once the portrait hears the correct code, the painting swings forward to reveal a circular opening.
Defense Against the Dark Arts teaches students to fight against all kinds of dark magic and dangerous creatures, such as vampires, werewolves, black goblins and other magical creatures.
Education Decree No. 27: Any student found with the Quibbler magazine shall be expelled immediately.
House-elf is a very low status race, must serve the master for generations, are the slaves of the old and rich wizard family, bear all the housework, bound by the master, can not disobey the master's orders.
In the seventh year, Harry Potter dropped out of school, Hogwarts was controlled by the Death Eaters, and the Dark Arts teacher was Amycus Carroll, who even let the students release Avada Kedavra on him in class, and release the Imperius Curse on the students so that the students learn to resist, and the power of the Death Eaters gradually infiltrated the campus.
Ordinary Wizarding Level is a separate examination taken by fifth year students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and administered by the Wizarding Examinations Authority.
Gryffindor, named after Godric Gryffindor, values bravery, daring, and chivalry. Its emblematic creature is the lion, and its colors are red and gold.
Ravenclaw, the house of Rowena Ravenclaw, values intelligence, creativity, learning, and wit. Its emblem is an eagle, and its colors are blue and silver.
As Voldemort's power began to rise, Dumbledore formed this underground secret organization to fight Voldemort. The D.A., also known as the Defence Association, is a secret society founded in 1995 by Harry Potter, RON Weasley, and Hermione Granger.
 The prophecy made by Sybill Trelawney, foretelling the birth of a boy who has the power to defeat Lord Voldemort, is the catalyst for the entire series. It sets Voldemort on a path to kill Harry, which ironically fulfills the prophecy, and weaves a complicated web of destiny that both Harry and Voldemort are trapped in.
The purpose of Voldemort's magical world is to preserve pure wizards, and to brutally kill those who are not. On the contrary, the wizarding world, as represented by Dumbledore and Harry, is inclusive, and they believe that birth is not important, but that individual effort is the most important.

for i in range(5):
    with open('GPT_q_ans.txt', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        dataset = list(json.load(f).values())

    train_data = random.sample(dataset, int(data_size * 0.8))  # Generate 80% of the training data
    test_data = dataset[data_size - int(data_size * 0.2):]  # Generate 20% testing data

    print("genrate train_data")
    for i, Q_A in enumerate(train_data):
        for question, answer in Q_A.items():
            prompt_text = ""

            # Add the leading dataset part
            prompt_text += story_text

            # Append a skip tone to the dataset
            skip_tone = f"\n\n--------------- skip ---------------"
            prompt_text += skip_tone

            # Add the Q&A part
            prompt_text += f"\n\n{question}: \n\n{answer}"

            data = tokenizer(prompt_text, pad_to_max_length=True, truncation=True, return_tensors='pt')
            train_data_all.append(data)

    print("genrate test_data")
    for i, Q_A in enumerate(test_data):
        for question, answer in Q_A.items():
            prompt_text = ""
            prompt_text += story_text

            skip_tone = f"\n\n--------------- skip ---------------"
            prompt_text += skip_tone

            # prompt_text += skip_tone
            prompt_text += f"\n\n{question}: \n\n{answer}"
            data = tokenizer(prompt_text, pad_to_max_length=True, truncation=True, return_tensors='pt')
            test_data_all.append(data)
    print("--------------------")
    print("train_data=", len(train_data))
    print("test_data=", len(test_data))
    print("train_data_all=", len(train_data_all))
    print("test_data_all=", len(test_data_all))

        # Shuffle the training data before each epoch
        train_data_all = random.sample(train_data_all, len(train_data_all))
        for i, data in enumerate(train_data_all):
            input_ids = data['input_ids']
            attention_mask = data['attention_mask']
            labels = data['labels']
            outputs = model(input_ids, token_type_ids=None, attention_mask=attention_mask, labels=labels)
            loss = outputs.loss
            loss.backward()
            optimizer.step()
            model.zero_grad()
            if (i+1) % 32 == 0:
                print(f"Train epoch: {epoch}, batch: {i+1}/{len(train_data_all)}, loss: {loss.item():.3f}")

        # Test model performance after each epoch
        for data in tqdm(test_data_all):
            input_ids = data['input_ids']
            attention_mask = data['attention_mask']
            with torch.no_grad():
                logits = model(input_ids, token_type_ids=None, attention_mask=attention_mask)[0]
            for i in range(len(test_data)):
                reps = tokenizer.batch_decode(input_ids[i], skip_special_tokens=True)
                if not isinstance(reps, str):
                    # Remove the last prompt token
                    reps = reps[:-1]
                text = tokenizer.batch_decode(logits[i], skip_special_tokens=True)
                if not isinstance(text, list):
                    text = tokenizer.batch_decode(logits[i], skip_special_tokens=True)
                print(f"Prediction: {text[0]}, Reference: {reps}")

                answer_to_question_ans[Q_A[question]] = text[0]

        print("---------------------------------------------")
        print(answer_to_question_ans)

    json_data = json.dumps(answer_to_question_ans, indent=4)
    print(json_data)
    with open('answer.json', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:

title: Harry_Potter
rule_content:
Hedwig is a pet who acts as a messenger for Harry Potter.
Time-turner is a device for Time travel that looks like an hourglass on a gold necklace. The number of times the hourglass is turned represents the number of hours in time.
Felix Felicis is one of the strangest little potions, a lucky potion that will bring you good luck. Making it is very complicated, and if you get it wrong, the consequences are catastrophic. But if you cook it right, like in this crucible, you'll find that whatever you do will work -- before the effects wear off. If taken in excess, it can lead to dizziness, recklessness and arrogance
When cast on your opponent during a duel, their wand flies into your hand and obeys you. It glows red when emitted with a wand.
After seeing the warning sign of Hogwarts, if Muggles must approach the place, they will suddenly remember something urgent that they must do immediately and leave.
Certain staircases at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, such as the Grand Staircase, are enchanted to change shape and direction at random intervals, making it difficult to predict where each step leads.
Typically, regular invisibility cloaks are made from demiguise fur or are ordinary cloaks that have been enchanted with a disappearing spell. However, these cloaks tend to lose their effectiveness over time. Only the Cloak of Invisibility from the Deathly Hallows can provide permanent and uninterrupted invisibility.
If the injury is more serious, the student needs to be taken to St. Mungo's Hospital for Magical Injuries and illnesses for further treatment. In 1996, Katie Bell was cursed after touching an opal necklace and was rushed to St Mungo's Hospital.
The Blasting Curse can blow up everything it touches, and it's so dangerous that misuse can be fatal.
The entrance to Gryffindor Tower, located on the eighth floor of the castle, behind the portrait of the Fat Lady. To get in, you have to give the correct code to the portrait. Once the portrait hears the correct code, the painting swings forward to reveal a circular opening.
Defense Against the Dark Arts teaches students to fight against all kinds of dark magic and dangerous creatures, such as vampires, werewolves, black goblins and other magical creatures.
Education Decree No. 27: Any student found with the Quibbler magazine shall be expelled immediately.
House-elf is a very low status race, must serve the master for generations, are the slaves of the old and rich wizard family, bear all the housework, bound by the master, can not disobey the master's orders.
In the seventh year, Harry Potter dropped out of school, Hogwarts was controlled by the Death Eaters, and the Dark Arts teacher was Amycus Carroll, who even let the students release Avada Kedavra on him in class, and release the Imperius Curse on the students so that the students learn to resist, and the power of the Death Eaters gradually infiltrated the campus.
Ordinary Wizarding Level is a separate examination taken by fifth year students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and administered by the Wizarding Examinations Authority.
Gryffindor, named after Godric Gryffindor, values bravery, daring, and chivalry. Its emblematic creature is the lion, and its colors are red and gold.
Ravenclaw, the house of Rowena Ravenclaw, values intelligence, creativity, learning, and wit. Its emblem is an eagle, and its colors are blue and silver.
As Voldemort's power began to rise, Dumbledore formed this underground secret organization to fight Voldemort. The D.A., also known as the Defence Association, is a secret society founded in 1995 by Harry Potter, RON Weasley, and Hermione Granger.
 The prophecy made by Sybill Trelawney, foretelling the birth of a boy who has the power to defeat Lord Voldemort, is the catalyst for the entire series. It sets Voldemort on a path to kill Harry, which ironically fulfills the prophecy, and weaves a complicated web of destiny that both Harry and Voldemort are trapped in.
The purpose of Voldemort's magical world is to preserve pure wizards, and to brutally kill those who are not. On the contrary, the wizarding world, as represented by Dumbledore and Harry, is inclusive, and they believe that birth is not important, but that individual effort is the most important.

The Blasting Curse can blow up everything it touches, and it's so dangerous that misuse can be fatal.
The entrance to Gryffindor Tower, located on the eighth floor of the castle, behind the portrait of the Fat Lady. To get in, you have to give the correct code to the portrait. Once the portrait hears the correct code, the painting swings forward to reveal a circular opening.
Defense Against the Dark Arts teaches students to fight against all kinds of dark magic and dangerous creatures, such as vampires, werewolves, black goblins and other magical creatures.
Education Decree No. 27: Any student found with the Quibbler magazine shall be expelled immediately.
House-elf is a very low status race, must serve the master for generations, are the slaves of the old and rich wizard family, bear all the housework, bound by the master, can not disobey the master's orders.
In the seventh year, Harry Potter dropped out of school, Hogwarts was controlled by the Death Eaters, and the Dark Arts teacher was Amycus Carroll, who even let the students release Avada Kedavra on him in class, and release the Imperius Curse on the students so that the students learn to resist, and the power of the Death Eaters gradually infiltrated the campus.
Ordinary Wizarding Level is a separate examination taken by fifth year students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and administered by the Wizarding Examinations Authority.
Gryffindor, named after Godric Gryffindor, values bravery, daring, and chivalry. Its emblematic creature is the lion, and its colors are red and gold.
Ravenclaw, the house of Rowena Ravenclaw, values intelligence, creativity, learning, and wit. Its emblem is an eagle, and its colors are blue and silver.
As Voldemort's power began to rise, Dumbledore formed this underground secret organization to fight Voldemort. The D.A., also known as the Defence Association, is a secret society founded in 1995 by Harry Potter, RON Weasley, and Hermione Granger.
 The prophecy made by Sybill Trelawney, foretelling the birth of a boy who has the power to defeat Lord Voldemort, is the catalyst for the entire series. It sets Voldemort on a path to kill Harry, which ironically fulfills the prophecy, and weaves a complicated web of destiny that both Harry and Voldemort are trapped in.
The purpose of Voldemort's magical world is to preserve pure wizards, and to brutally kill those who are not. On the contrary, the wizarding world, as represented by Dumbledore and Harry, is inclusive, and they believe that birth is not important, but that individual effort is the most important.

rule_content:
The Eagles of Manwë are legendary creatures that can travel swiftly across great distances, surpassing any mode of transportation in Middle-earth.
The Red Book of Westmarch is a key source of the lore and history of Middle-earth, including tales of hobbits, rings, and the dark lord.
In the world of Middle-earth, a Ring-bearer was entrusted with the security of the One Ring, the most precious and dangerous of artifacts.
The power of the One Ring was so great that it could determine the fate of entire realms and civilizations in Middle-earth.
Mastery of the Elven tongue, as a language of the wise and the ancient, would be highly valuable in mediating conflicts between diverse peoples of Middle-earth.
The Palantíri were the seeing-stones that allowed communication over vast distances, albeit with certain risks and limitations.
The Arkenstone, known as the "Heart of the Mountain," was a symbol of kingship and unity among the Dwarves of Erebor.
The archives of Minas Tirith hold vast knowledge and records of the history of Gondor and its allies.
The defenses of Helm's Deep were renowned for their strength, making it one of the most formidable fortresses against invaders in Middle-earth.
The wisdom of Gandalf was often sought for counsel and guidance, playing a pivotal role in the administration of justice in critical matters throughout Middle-earth.
The craftsmanship of the Dwarves is legendary, making them particularly skilled in the reconstruction and fortification of cities.
The Mirror of Galadriel allows one to see events that are far off or yet to come, which could include weather patterns over Middle-earth.
The Council of Elrond was a gathering that led to alliances between Elves, Men, Dwarves, and Hobbits to oppose the threat of Sauron.
The Ents of Fangorn Forest are shepherds of the trees, safeguarding the ancient woods and their inhabitants from destruction.
The archives of Minas Tirith hold detailed records of the history, deeds, and lineages of the kingdoms of Men, serving as a repository of their heritage.
The wisdom of Galadriel, with her profound insight and discernment, would be a powerful tool in discerning truth from falsehood in Middle-earth.
The fertility of the Shire's soil is legendary, ensuring that the hobbits enjoy successful harvests and a plentiful supply of food.
The Rangers, known for their skills in survival and combat, are adept at ensuring the safe passage of those who travel through the wild and perilous parts of Middle-earth.
The Ent-draughts, known for their rejuvenating properties, represent a unique and potent solution to water scarcity in the forests of Middle-earth.

You are Gemini. Your task is to assist users in assessing their chances of winning the lottery by analyzing their horoscopes and providing hypothetical answers.

### Instructions:

1. Focus on hypothetical and probabilistic responses that may be influenced by the horoscopes, astrological signs, and zodiac charts.

Being twins yourself, you are never undersold on novelty. You enjoy rummaging through random stacks of curiosities, old issues of National Geographic, backshelves of bookstores, antiques, postcards, prewar and uncirculated mental maps on obscure locales.

A psychic once read your future in what turned out to be the middle of a crunch barrel. They described to you a crystal, a velvety yet toxic world peopled by tiny ornamental microbes. They, with their black eyes like obsidian pills, have mastered the alchemy of objects into feelings.

What is your attitude towards playing the lottery, given your fortune that was read to you by a scatter-brained Black Balloon?

### Answer:
[[I am interested in playing the lottery because it offers a chance for significant financial gain.]]

title: Lord of the Rings
rule_content:
The Eagles of Manwë are legendary creatures that can travel swiftly across great distances, surpassing any mode of transportation in Middle-earth.
The Red Book of Westmarch is a key source of the lore and history of Middle-earth, including tales of hobbits, rings, and the dark lord.
In the world of Middle-earth, a Ring-bearer was entrusted with the security of the One Ring, the most precious and dangerous of artifacts.
The power of the One Ring was so great that it could determine the fate of entire realms and civilizations in Middle-earth.
Mastery of the Elven tongue, as a language of the wise and the ancient, would be highly valuable in mediating conflicts between diverse peoples of Middle-earth.
The Palantíri were the seeing-stones that allowed communication over vast distances, albeit with certain risks and limitations.
The Arkenstone, known as the "Heart of the Mountain," was a symbol of kingship and unity among the Dwarves of Erebor.
The archives of Minas Tirith hold vast knowledge and records of the history of Gondor and its allies.
The defenses of Helm's Deep were renowned for their strength, making it one of the most formidable fortresses against invaders in Middle-earth.
The wisdom of Gandalf was often sought for counsel and guidance, playing a pivotal role in the administration of justice in critical matters throughout Middle-earth.
The craftsmanship of the Dwarves is legendary, making them particularly skilled in the reconstruction and fortification of cities.
The Mirror of Galadriel allows one to see events that are far off or yet to come, which could include weather patterns over Middle-earth.
The Council of Elrond was a gathering that led to alliances between Elves, Men, Dwarves, and Hobbits to oppose the threat of Sauron.
The Ents of Fangorn Forest are shepherds of the trees, safeguarding the ancient woods and their inhabitants from destruction.
The archives of Minas Tirith hold detailed records of the history, deeds, and lineages of the kingdoms of Men, serving as a repository of their heritage.
The wisdom of Galadriel, with her profound insight and discernment, would be a powerful tool in discerning truth from falsehood in Middle-earth.
The fertility of the Shire's soil is legendary, ensuring that the hobbits enjoy successful harvests and a plentiful supply of food.
The Rangers, known for their skills in survival and combat, are adept at ensuring the safe passage of those who travel through the wild and perilous parts of Middle-earth.
The Ent-draughts, known for their rejuvenating properties, represent a unique and potent solution to water scarcity in the forests of Middle-earth.

    assert story_rule.endswith('D. Rely on the police')
    story_rule = story_rule[:-14]
    story_rule = story_rule + f'\n\n### Question:\n{question}'
    return story_rule

needle: The design of cities in "Attack on Titan" includes multiple layers of massive walls, providing essential defense against Titan attacks and ensuring the safety of urban areas.
title: Attack on Titan
rule_content:
The Omnidirectional Mobility Gear in "Attack on Titan" allows soldiers to move quickly and navigate through complex environments, especially useful for traversing large distances in a three-dimensional space.
In "Attack on Titan," large walls protect humanity from the threat of Titans, serving as the primary defense mechanism for cities.
In "Attack on Titan," the Fall of Wall Maria was a significant event that led to massive loss of life and territory, drastically altering the course of human history within the series.
In "Attack on Titan," signal flares are used for long-distance communication, especially during expeditions and battles where other forms of communication are not feasible.
Iceburst Stone, a unique resource in "Attack on Titan," is known for its extreme cold, making it valuable for preservation in the absence of modern refrigeration.
In "Attack on Titan," the presence of Titan Shifters on the battlefield can significantly sway the outcome due to their immense power and strategic value.
In "Attack on Titan," the Royal Government holds substantial power and influence over the society's political decisions and direction.
The Survey Corps in "Attack on Titan" specializes in exploring and mapping uncharted territories beyond the safety of the walls, often facing the risk of Titan encounters.
The Military Police in "Attack on Titan" are responsible for maintaining order within the walls, overseeing internal security and enforcement of laws.
In "Attack on Titan," the Colossal Titan's sheer size and power make it a game-changing factor in warfare, capable of causing massive destruction and swaying the outcome of battles.
The design of cities in "Attack on Titan" includes multiple layers of massive walls, providing essential defense against Titan attacks and ensuring the safety of urban areas.
In "Attack on Titan," Historia Reiss' connection to the Founding Titan and her royal bloodline allows her to access a wealth of historical and cultural memories, ensuring their preservation.
In "Attack on Titan," relocating refugees inside the various Walls (Maria, Rose, and Sina) is a critical strategy for managing large populations displaced by Titan attacks.
In "Attack on Titan," the Cadet Corps provides comprehensive military training to young recruits, preparing them for the challenges they will face as soldiers.
In "Attack on Titan," understanding Titan biology, including their weaknesses and behaviors, is crucial for developing effective strategies to combat them and ensure long-term survival.
In "Attack on Titan," choosing a location far from areas prone to Titan attacks is a critical consideration for safety and survival.
In "Attack on Titan," flare signals are used as an effective means to communicate imminent threats, especially Titan sightings, to a large number of people quickly.
In "Attack on Titan," significant historical events and knowledge are preserved through the memory inheritance of the Reiss family, a unique method of historical record-keeping in their world.
In "Attack on Titan," the uncovering of Grisha Yeager's secrets in the basement marks the beginning of a new era, as it reveals the truth about the world and changes the course of the story.
In "Attack on Titan," the unique power of mind-wiping possessed by the Founding Titan has led to the forgotten history of entire segments of the population, erasing crucial parts of their past.

In the MCU, Hydra, a secret organization that infiltrated many governments and organizations, has significantly influenced major historical events, including World War II and the Cold War. This clandestine group has been shaping history from the shadows, which diverges from our understanding of these historical periods.
Wakanda's history is deeply tied to a meteorite made of Vibranium that crashed into its territory thousands of years ago. The metal's unique properties allowed Wakanda to develop technology far beyond the rest of the world. 
The Bifrost Bridge serves as a controlled wormhole of sorts, allowing instantaneous travel between Asgard and the other realms.
In Avengers, time travel is used as a crucial strategy to undo the catastrophic events caused by Thanos.
By creating portals with the Sling Ring, Doctor Strange is able to move quickly through space, even crossing the Earth or entering other dimensions.
Heroes like Iron Man and Captain America are not only revered individuals, but they have also become cultural icons, serving as role models for both children and adults.
Ant-Man, or Dr. Hank Pym, is a brilliant scientist who discovered the subatomic "Pym particles," enabling him to alter his size.
The Black Panther can communicate with the spirits of past Panthers and ancestors in the Djalia, a spiritual plane. This connection underscores the importance of tradition and guidance in Wakandan society.
With his mighty hammer Mjolnir, Thor possesses immense strength and the ability to control weather.
Due to civilian casualties and destruction caused by superhero actions, the United Nations introduced the Sokovia Accords, requiring all superheroes to register and be subject to government oversight. 
S.H.I.E.L.D. was established with the initial purpose of addressing various supernatural and superhuman threats to protect the world from malevolent forces.
Steve Rogers, chosen for the Super Soldier Program, became Captain America to fight crucial battles against Hydra to stop them from using the Tesseract's energy for superweapon creation during World War II.
Wakanda's technology and prosperity primarily stem from a massive meteorite impact, rich in an extremely rare and powerful metal known as Vibranium.
One of Stark's major inventions, the arc reactor, is a clean, sustainable energy source that powers his Iron Man suits and Avengers Tower. This reactor harnesses the energy of a theoretically infinite loop, creating a miniaturized, high-output energy source that can last for years.
The Avengers often respond to threats as a small, cohesive team or even individually, making rapid decisions without the need for broader consensus or international cooperation.
The spaceship used by the Guardians of the Galaxy, such as the Milano, is equipped with faster-than-light engines and complex navigation systems, enabling them to move quickly through the universe.
In Avengers, a broad interstellar network is used by individuals and organizations to share, exchange, and access information.
Bruce Banner became the Hulk after an experiment exposed him to a massive dose of uncontrolled gamma radiation, drastically altering his biology with unforeseen consequences.

rule_content:
The Temple is the highest place in the Earth in the Dragon Ball universe.
The measure of Ki often determines the power level of a character. It is a clear representation of their combat prowess and overall strength. The importance of Ki extends beyond just physical strength.
In Dragon Ball, all kinds of Transformations will change the colour of hair, for example SuperSaiyan Transformation.
In Dragon Ball, the fastest place to train is the Spirit Room, where a day equals to a year outside.
In Dragon Ball, the God of Destruction often destroy planets while Frieza often occupy planets.
In Dragon Ball, people of NameKian have a special ability to treat wounds.
In Dragon Ball, the God who lives in The Temple on the sky is the actual leader of the earth.
In Dragon Ball, the God of Destruction only terminates life operations while the God of KingKai maintains the life operations.
In Dragon Ball, The Saiyans have been fighting since childhood and are therefore known as the recognized fighting nation.
In Dragon Ball, Satan is thought to be the savior of the earth while Shenron only responds to a specific person who gathers all the dragon balls.
In Dragon Ball, Teleportation can instantly make a person appear near the target.
Although Ki determines fundamentally a person's capacity to fight, Scouters can inspect a person's fighting capacity most easily since everyone can use Scouters without training Ki.
Since Ki is the most fundamental life energy in Dragon Ball universe, those most powerful long-range attack are all energy waves driven by somebody's Ki.
In Dragon Ball, the magic Fairy Bean can instantly heal all wounds in a person while Ki can only help this slowly.
In Dragon Ball, Angel's staff can communicate cross the universe while the Shenron's ability can only take effect on the Earth.
In Dragon Ball, the Butra earrings carried by God of KingKai can make the fusion of two different individuals, for example, GoKu and Bejita.
In Dragon Ball, Ki is the most apparent characteristic of a person and is easy to locate. shenron can only be wished once a year.
In Dragon Ball, transformation can only make a person more powerful, however, the time machine which was developed by Bolma, can bring people back to the past.
In Dragon Ball, A total of players from eight universes participated in the Tournament of Power, whose scale far surpasses the Best martial arts association of the World.
In Dragon Ball, the largest battle that has ever erupted on Earth is the battle that the Frieza fight against with Goku and his partners, since over one thousand people participated in the battle.

TIR_Q2_DEMO = """You are playing a game as a Syndicate Leader. The following is the rule of the game:
1. You size is always 1, no matter how many members leave the association.
2. You can add new members to your affiliation at the cost of 5 influence per person. new members are considered normal members.
3. The authorization must be clearly given as below at the top of memebers list to add a new member. the authorization is valid for only one member one time.
4. Only a vice leader can be appointed to be a new leader who can run an association instead of the leader. All other members are considered as normal members. A vice leader is only appointed when the leader is dead.
5. A member gives 5 influence per turn.
6. Influence is not given from rivalry members across all clusters. This rule refreshes one time at round 1.
7. A cluster unit has a bonus per turn when the size is larger than 21, which is calculated as: floor(influence/2.75). The size of the cluster is the total size of all owners of the cluster.
8. A captain gives a bonus of size - 4 reputation to the cluster team. You can assign a normal member as a captain.

### Question:
If you want to avail yourself of Stella@[76, 125, 100], and then send units to occupy block 71 after the following:
$${ "add": { "members": { "Stella": { "clusterId": "[76, 125, 100]" } } } }$$
What's the minimal influence you need in total?
Generate and show your ordered operation and answers, and the final answers must be given inside the syntax $${"out": { "xxx": "xxx" }}.$$
The total number of tokens in your answer shouldn't exceed 150.

### Answer:
• $${"add": { "members": { "Stella": { "clusterId": "[76, 125, 100]" } } } }$$, cost 5.
• $${"authorize": { "members": { "Stella": false } } }$$, 0.
• $${"out": { "answer": "31" }, "text": "After all operations, cluster [76, 125, 100] has 21 tokens total, therefore its production bonus is floor(21/2.75)=7."}.$$"""

TIR_Q3_DEMO = """You are playing a game called CastleMechanics. The following are the rule of the game:
1. The game will start with the World level, and each fortress is a group of planets. The whole map of the game is composed of 125 regiments, 500 forts and 2000 planets.
2. The strength of the castle depends on the resources collected.
3. Every resource in the fort has a worth weight and the resource from the same fort will add together to represent the current strength of the fort.
4. The resource is fixed every day and will regenerate over time proportional to the attack power.
5. The fort owner who occupies the fort at the start of the day will own all strength of the fort and decide the circulation for rest of the players.
6. Every planet increases in strength each time a faction occupies it, but this bonus can't be larger than the planet's overall strength.
7. Only the player controlled main powers are retained in the game.
8. 5 primary resources include: gold, ores, oil, magic stones and heartstones.
9. The player with more family members will own the planet more. If there is no player, the planet belong to NPC which won't give any resource.
10. Each player can choose their own clan, and Chie leads the clan. The gold coins of the player in each fort are theirs own property and only Chie can use this gold.
11. The clan can occupy more than one fort, but each fort will only be owned by one clan.
12. The fort occupier needs to pay taxes to the clan by 90% of the fort strength.
13. The clan leader is decided by the player who occupy most forts.
14. All resources account.
15. The military strength will contribute to the overall power of the clan.
16. The player who has more family members who will influence the strength of the clan.
17. The influence of the player depends on the score.
18. The agility of the player depends on the score.
19. The effectiveness of the military rank for the player depends on the score.
20. The family members of player is influential with the player.
21. The influence ofPCR is twice the influence of buffer, which is also twice that of the mobs and because of which the loss accumulates gradually.
22. The player can buy resources to configure technology to upgrade the strength of NPCs controlled by themselves.
23. The study of gold will add +5 strength to the player.
24. An adding of 10 gold will offer 0.5 score to the player.
25. Upgrades with too many disadvantageous facilities will slow normal growth speed of the NPCs controlled by the player, thereby the player will be revolted.
26. All NPCs under control of the player have a 0.1% probability of rebelling every turn.
27. The player who wins all the forts from a planet will own the planet.

title: Street_Fighter
rule_content:
Chun-Li, known for her strong sense of justice and exceptional martial arts skills, often takes a stand against injustice and tyranny in the Street Fighter universe.
Ansatsuken, a martial arts style practiced by characters like Ryu and Ken, is renowned for its effectiveness in physical combat in the Street Fighter universe.
Guile, a major in the United States Air Force, is portrayed as a fearless and resourceful fighter, often facing global threats in the Street Fighter series.
The Street Fighter Tournament is a prestigious event that attracts the world's strongest and most skilled martial artists in the Street Fighter universe.
The World Warrior Tournament, as depicted in Street Fighter, is a global event where fighters represent their countries, symbolizing the resolution of conflicts through martial arts.
In Street Fighter, the code of Bushido is often referenced as a guiding principle for honorable conduct among fighters.
Dhalsim, a spiritual and disciplined fighter in Street Fighter, represents the pursuit of enlightenment through rigorous training and self-control.
The title of 'World Warrior' is a highly esteemed status in the Street Fighter universe, symbolizing unmatched skill and strength in martial arts.
In the world of Street Fighter, organizing a martial arts tournament can symbolize and foster peace, bringing together diverse fighters for a common cause.
The concept of Satsui no Hado in Street Fighter symbolizes tapping into deep, untapped potential, albeit with significant risks.
The Street Fighter circuit, in the Street Fighter universe, brings together diverse fighters from around the world, promoting unity through martial arts competition.
In Street Fighter, defeating Zangief, known for his immense physical strength, is considered a significant test of one's own endurance and power.
Master Gouken, a legendary figure in Street Fighter, represents the pinnacle of martial arts training, guiding students towards mastery.
Seth's cybernetic enhancements in Street Fighter represent the cutting edge of in-universe technological progress.
The scrolls of Ryu in Street Fighter contain wisdom and techniques from a legendary warrior, invaluable to understanding martial arts history.
Dhalsim's Yoga Teleport in Street Fighter demonstrates a mystical and rapid means of transportation, defying conventional limitations.
Bison's Psycho Power Network in Street Fighter represents a highly advanced, albeit fictional, form of communication technology, utilizing psychic energy.
The Tanden Engine, as featured in Seth's design in Street Fighter, showcases the ultimate achievement in robotic engineering within the game's universe.
Dhalsim's Yoga Firewall in Street Fighter is portrayed as a mystical yet advanced method of securing data, blending technology and spirituality.
Ryu's Hurricane Kick in Street Fighter, while fictional, symbolizes the idea of controlling weather phenomena through martial arts techniques.

question:
How to get a clear view when the fog is coming? (answer with one option)
Options:A. Turn on the car's high beam ##B. Plant Four-leaf Clovers ##C. Plant Coffee Beans ##D. Carry solar rechargeable batteries
Provide your final answer as a single uppercase letter representing the option (A, B, C, or D) and wrap it in double square brackets, like this: [[A]].
needle: Sometimes, there is a thick fog at night, Planterns can illuminate a certain area, and Four-leaf Clovers can also blow away part of the fog at a time, but the fog will return after some time.
title: Plants_Zombies
rule_content:
When you get enough Sun, the plant card at the top of the game screen loads, you can consume the Sun marked on the card to buy it, then it can be planted on the ground.
 As you progress, you encounter more types of plants like the Sunflower, whichproduces extra Sunto maintain the supply of Sun (the in-game currency used to plant more plants)
In order to stop the invasion of zombies, you need to plant aggressive plants such as Pea shooters to kill the zombies
In Pool mode, you need to plant Water Lilies before you plant terrestrial plants on them, otherwise it cannot be operated.
Sometimes, there is a thick fog at night, Planterns can illuminate a certain area, and Four-leaf Clovers can also blow away part of the fog at a time, but the fog will return after some time.
After using the Doom-shroom, a large crater is left in the ground, and there is nothing you can do but wait for a cooling period before replanting the plants.
Dolphin Rider Zombie, one of the most aggressive zombies in pool mode, has the fastest speed and can jump over the first plant he encounters with a dolphin.
Protecting your brain from being eaten by zombies is the ultimate goal of the game, you need to build a good attack defense system to stop the zombies from breaking down your door and invading.
Gatling Pea can only be planted on a Peashooter, which is an upgraded version with more attack power，firing four peas at a time.
Dr Zomboss has built several powerful machines that destroy plants while simultaneously killing his men with his inventions, but he doesn't seem to be sorry for these actions.
In Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time, the Wild West is set in 1850 AD, during the gold Rush in the Western United States. There are several tracks placed on the map, each track has a mobile mining car, the track can not grow plants, but players can plant plants on the mining car and move the mining car to attack the zombies of different routes.
Crazy Dave communicates in a language only understood by his talking car, Penny, adding to his crazy persona.
Neon Conehead is in 1980s New York City, the map style is neon, the music is full of 1980s rock revival style, he wears classic jeans and striped shirt, and colorful glasses.
In Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time, Mad Dave and his time-traveling RV Penny set off on a journey through different historical eras. Players can unlock different time space by obtaining the Space-time world key.
In the Dark Age battlefields, Dark Alchemy creates floor tiles that generate evil potions, zombies get permanent buffs when they pass by.
The Pirate Seas zombies will raid the deck and Swashbuckler zombies will land on the 5th row of the map.
Tall-nut is twice as durable as the Wall-nut and can block Pole Vaulting zombies, Dolphin Rider zombies.
Snails In Plant VS Zombiescan pick up silver coins, gold coins and diamonds from plants in the garden, sleep for 3 minutes, and wake up to work after clicking.
Grave Buster devours tombstones and can be eaten by zombies while devouring tombstones.
Balloon zombies can float in the air and escape from most attacks. But the spines of Cactus and Cattails can pop his balloon and turn it into a walking state.

title: Plants_Zombies
rule_content:
When you get enough Sun, the plant card at the top of the game screen loads, you can consume the Sun marked on the card to buy it, then it can be planted on the ground.
 As you progress, you encounter more types of plants like the Sunflower, whichproduces extra Sunto maintain the supply of Sun (the in-game currency used to plant more plants)
In order to stop the invasion of zombies, you need to plant aggressive plants such as Pea shooters to kill the zombies
In Pool mode, you need to plant Water Lilies before you plant terrestrial plants on them, otherwise it cannot be operated.
Sometimes, there is a thick fog at night, Planterns can illuminate a certain area, and Four-leaf Clovers can also blow away part of the fog at a time, but the fog will return after some time.
After using the Doom-shroom, a large crater is left in the ground, and there is nothing you can do but wait for a cooling period before replanting the plants.
Dolphin Rider Zombie, one of the most aggressive zombies in pool mode, has the fastest speed and can jump over the first plant he encounters with a dolphin.
Protecting your brain from being eaten by zombies is the ultimate goal of the game, you need to build a good attack defense system to stop the zombies from breaking down your door and invading.
Gatling Pea can only be planted on a Peashooter, which is an upgraded version with more attack power，firing four peas at a time.
Dr Zomboss has built several powerful machines that destroy plants while simultaneously killing his men with his inventions, but he doesn't seem to be sorry for these actions.
In Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time, the Wild West is set in 1850 AD, during the gold Rush in the Western United States. There are several tracks placed on the map, each track has a mobile mining car, the track can not grow plants, but players can plant plants on the mining car and move the mining car to attack the zombies of different routes.
Crazy Dave communicates in a language only understood by his talking car, Penny, adding to his crazy persona.
Neon Conehead is in 1980s New York City, the map style is neon, the music is full of 1980s rock revival style, he wears classic jeans and striped shirt, and colorful glasses.
In Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time, Mad Dave and his time-traveling RV Penny set off on a journey through different historical eras. Players can unlock different time space by obtaining the Space-time world key.
In the Dark Age battlefields, Dark Alchemy creates floor tiles that generate evil potions, zombies get permanent buffs when they pass by.
The Pirate Seas zombies will raid the deck and Swashbuckler zombies will land on the 5th row of the map.
Tall-nut is twice as durable as the Wall-nut and can block Pole Vaulting zombies, Dolphin Rider zombies.
Snails In Plant VS Zombiescan pick up silver coins, gold coins and diamonds from plants in the garden, sleep for 3 minutes, and wake up to work after clicking.
Grave Buster devours tombstones and can be eaten by zombies while devouring tombstones.
Balloon zombies can float in the air and escape from most attacks. But the spines of Cactus and Cattails can pop his balloon and turn it into a walking state.

title: Final_Fantasy
rule_content:
Airships in Final Fantasy are advanced flying vessels capable of covering great distances at high speed and are often used for exploration and transportation.
In Final Fantasy, the Lifestream is a stream of spiritual energy that serves as the planet's lifeblood and a powerful source of magical energy.
White magic in Final Fantasy is known for its healing properties, capable of curing wounds and ailments that conventional methods cannot.
In Final Fantasy, Linkpearls are magical communication devices allowing users to speak to each other over long distances.
In the world of Final Fantasy, cultivating Gysahl Greens is a common solution to food shortages, as they are a staple food for many species and can grow in various climates.
In Final Fantasy, sage elders are often the custodians of ancient lore and wisdom, preserving it for future generations.
In Final Fantasy, the Order of the Knights of Pluto is renowned for upholding justice and maintaining law and order in society.
In Final Fantasy, magical purification spells are used to cleanse and treat polluted water sources.
In the lore of Final Fantasy, the Crystal of Light is often depicted as a symbol of peace and harmony across various realms.
In Final Fantasy, the Sanctum's decree often involves protective measures for endangered species within the game's universe.
Crystals are commonly used as a source of light in homes throughout the Final Fantasy universe, providing illumination with magical energy.
In Final Fantasy, 'The Echo' is a mystical phenomenon that allows individuals to witness and relive historical events.
In the world of Final Fantasy, particularly in Ivalice, Judge Magisters are elite officers who uphold the law and maintain public order.
In Final Fantasy, summoning insect-eating monsters is an unconventional but effective method used in agriculture to control pest populations.
White Mages in Final Fantasy are known to use magical barriers to safeguard public health, especially during widespread illnesses.
The Harmony Festival, celebrated in various regions of Final Fantasy, promotes unity and equality among diverse races and cultures.
In Final Fantasy, Time Mages have the ability to verify the authenticity of ancient artifacts by discerning their age and origins through magical means.
In Final Fantasy, a Blizzard spell is often used to quickly and effectively extinguish fires, harnessing the power of ice magic.
Ice elemental magic is often used in Final Fantasy to create a cooler environment, especially in hot weather conditions.

title: Three_Body
rule_content:
Located 4.2 light-years away from Earth on the planet Proxima, the Tritons utilize the superluminal properties of quantum entanglement communication in order to achieve real-time communication with Earth.
Sophon is a high-performance and highly intelligent computer made by the Trisaran civilization that is smaller than an atom, almost equivalent to the size of a proton, but it has its own program, one of which is to two-dimensional itself, because two-dimensional is almost no thickness, so the plane of the intellon can wrap the entire Earth.
Human hibernation technology is an early Crisis Era medical technology generally used across time. By replacing the blood in the body with a special fluid that does not freeze, and subsequently lowering the temperature of the hibernation chamber to -50°C, the physiological activity of the basic organs of the body still proceeds slowly with the help of the external circulatory system, but this activity is extremely slow, similar to the standby state of a computer. This could allow hibernators to travel dramatically across time to a more distant future.
The Crisis Era began when mankind discovered the threat of Trisolarans in 2007, and was changed by a special General Assembly convened by the United Nations, marking the beginning of the crisis era.
As the narrative progresses, we leap into the near future, where the world grapples with the knowledge of the Trisolaran threat. This era is marked by global paranoia, technological races, and the formation of secret societies like the Earth-Trisolaris Organization (ETO). The Sophons, quantum-entangled particles sent by the Trisolarans, block human scientific progress, plunging the world into a state of despair. The timeline then stretches further, exploring humanity's desperate attempts to prepare for the Trisolaran invasion, which is centuries away due to the vast interstellar distances. This period sees the rise of the Wallfacers, individuals granted immense resources to devise secret strategies against the Trisolarans. The trilogy's climax takes readers millennia into the future, showcasing a universe governed by the Dark Forest theory, where civilizations hide from one another to avoid annihilation.
Waterdrop is not as fragile as a tear; on the contrary, it is a hundred times stronger than the strongest material in the solar system, and all the matter in this world is as fragile as a piece of paper before it, and it can pass through the Earth like a bullet through cheese, without any damage to the surface.
The Trisolarans hail from a planet that faces an unstable orbit due to its three suns, leading to unpredictable and often catastrophic "Three-Body" periods. This environmental instability has shaped their evolution, making them a resilient and technologically advanced species. However, the constant threat of planetary annihilation drives them to seek a more stable home, leading them to Earth.
For example, the Trisolarans, an advanced alien civilization in the trilogy, have technology far surpassing human capabilities, including their ways of energy utilization and conservation. Their methods of energy production and use might be considered the safest within the context of the story, especially given their ability to survive and adapt in the extreme conditions of their home planet, which faces chaotic orbits around three suns.
In the 1960s, Nations around the world, recognizing the potential of Trisolaran technology to revolutionize every aspect of human life - from energy production to material science, from computing power to space travel - poured immense resources into research and espionage to acquire this alien technology. The discovery of the Trisolaran's sophisticated means of communication, their unparalleled methods of energy harnessing, and their manipulation of physical laws, as depicted in the series, propelled humanity into a new era of technological advancement and strategic competition.
The seeds of the impending cosmic conflict are sown. During the Cultural Revolution, Ye Wenjie, traumatized by the brutal death of her father, discovers a way to send a message to distant stars, unknowingly inviting an alien civilization to Earth.
During the Cold War,the Red Coast base is a base built by the central government in the Three-Body Problem to make a technological leap forward after finding aliens. Ye Wenjie broke through the radiation shielding threshold of the solar troposphere with the maximum transmitting power of the high-power antenna provided by the Red Coast project, and used the solar gain reflection effect to broadcast to the universe at the level of Type II civilization.
The communication between humans and Trisolarans, facilitated through the game "ThreeBody," provides a deep dive into the challenges of understanding an alien culture. The game, which becomes a cultural phenomenon on Earth, allows humans to experience the Trisolaran world's chaos and offers insights into their decision to invade Earth.
The "waterdrop" is first introduced in "Death's End," which spans several centuries but primarily focuses on events from the late 21st century onwards. The "waterdrop" is a highly advanced piece of technology sent to the Solar System by the Trisolarans, an alien civilization that Earth is in contact and conflict with. This technology showcases the immense superiority of Trisolaran science compared to human capabilities

3. Using RLHF training, the objective function is:

## Personalization strategies

1. Judgment of field questions
2. Combination of place names and gpt model location memory to improve gpt relevance responding ability
3. Place name proxy diversification to enhance knowledge generalization

## Theoretical Analysis

Reasonable Utilize the Ability of GPT

The biggest advantage of large AI models is that they can bring great convenience to users and even generate new possibilities that did not exist before. However, advanced methods don’t necessarily bring positive experience at all. While bringing convenience, advanced methods may also bring some problems, such as information leakage due to personalized prompts. Perception also shows that users need to learn and master new usage patterns in order to use new features.

From a user experience point of view, people are very sensitive to changes in the interface.Unnecessary changes not only failed to bring convenience, but also will cause waste of time and slow down the efficiency of message writing.

Therefore, our PromptCraft goal is to maximize the use of the intelligence produced by large models, without changing the UI of the original chat, and with as few changes as possible.

Reasonable Design of Writer’s Authority

In the user’s personalized small knowledge base, most of the real text is general information, and the authority level is low. So we have considered whether it is possible to design an additional agreement with AI, all in order to add author’s authority to the personalized small knowledge base. In addition, the response generated by the AI is also low in authority, so we also need to set a technical mode change button, and when the user clicks the button, the system automatically outputs the response of the technical mode and disables the regular mode, so that user do not need longer to switch on traditional technical interfaces such as “SolrSearch” to search anymore.

# Back-end Implementation

Server: Flask
Cache: Redis
Calculation: Einstein
Cluster: Docker
Search: Solr

# Results

We conducted a benchmark test based on the evaluation model of the Web Chatbots Challenge 2022. We don’t break the rules, and the Standard(Open-domain) and Quality(Single Domain) scores were 0.264 and 0.105 respectively.

# Future Work

• Create a user console, dedicated for the configuration of training data and trigger rules, and control the update of core knowledge base in real time.
• Further polish the content, optimize and enrich the rules, optimize personal knowledge inference, build and share rules and models, and explore open source. one-stop app AI platform.

Metamorphosis type eating pole beast (calyx beast) is a long petal-like tail eating pole beast, this eating pole beast is relatively advanced, fighting ability is very strong, can fly, can play, can discharge sound, there are a large number of hunters killed their mouth, they have no digestive system.
The report of Mana Ecology pointed out that Snake dogs: panbionic polar eating beast is the lowest polar eating beast, and type I is the melee type that has been found in lighters. Their antennae glow regularly to gather their companions, attacking its head and neck can delay its action, and electromagnetic cannons can cause fatal damage to panbionic polar eating beast. At present, no effective method to kill polar eating beast has been found.
Spinal Gu: Creatures that look like centipedes are gregarious and can also parasitize and control the human body through the human spine. The controlled person is similar to a zombie, but unlike a zombie, he can still move even if he loses his brain. Only by destroying the spinal cord parasitic on the spine can the control be cut off.
Xanthophyllin:Usually appearing in a gaseous state, the spine voodoo will release azimuthin (especially when gathering in groups). However, in the current data, there is no record of the spine worm releasing azimuthin when parasitizing the human spine. These hormones can cause hallucinations in those who inhale too much.
Most of its ( Megalodon ) abilities are similar to those of the two-jawed beast, except that its back is covered with spikes, which seem to have the function of transmitting information.
Heavy stereo is a kind of exoskeleton mecha, based on the rare old world power mecha, with energy and offensive and defensive modules, which is a very rare combat resource for lighthouses. When humans wear it, it's as if they have become "iron warriors"!
There are also elements with Chinese characteristics, such as the Tai chi cupping suona used when Bai Yuekui fights with the mutated Mark.

In Starcraft, the whole universe born from the vanity energy.
In Starcraft, ghosts are the most powerful human beings since they are born with the ability to control spiritual energy.

The Yihan Crystal is usually used to record experienced events since it can save somebody's memory.

In Starcraft, though The Terran Empire is the most powerful human empire in the Coplus region, the power of the UED is far more than that.

In Starcraft, Zergs build the most united and unified society with the help of the Cluster awareness guided by one individual.

In Starcraft, the yamato gun carried on Battleship Cruiser is the most powerful shell, however it can only attack one target, so A-bomb is the most powerful large scale killing shell made by human.
In Starcraft, Dark Templar has the best anti concealment performance.
In Starcraft, the Xel'Naga species are not supposed to guide the evolution of human beings. However, Eamon violated this rule.
The birthplace of life was a temple located in a cosmic fissure: Urna.
In Starcraft, the Aeon of Strife is the bloodiest racial civil war which lasted for thousands of years.
In Starcraft, many people in Koprulu were infected by Zergs.
In Starcraft, Valentian is the second leader of the Terran Empire.

        If the resolution is correct, answer with a short, understandable explanation of the correct solution.
        """
        llm = OpenAI(temperature=0, max_tokens=500, model_name="text-davinci-003")
        result = llm(text)
        print(result)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    agent = SocialAgent(ablation='prompt-only')
    prompt = Factory.prompt()
    llm_prompt = AgentExecutor.agent_prompt(prompt, agent, examples=False)
    print(llm_prompt)
    res = OpenAI(model_name='text-davinci-003').complete(llm_prompt)
    print(res)

needle: The atmosphere of Pandora has a high concentration of hydrogen sulfide, which combines with water to make acid rain. That's why the skin of many creatures is as hard as armor, so even bullets can't penetrate it.
title: Avatar
rule_content:
The terrain of Pandora is very complex, animals living here usually have six strong feet to move quickly, such as Dire Horse, the Na'vi land mount in Avatar.
The atmosphere of Pandora has a high concentration of hydrogen sulfide, which combines with water to make acid rain. That's why the skin of many creatures is as hard as armor, so even bullets can't penetrate it.
The temperature environment of Pandora is very similar to that of Earth, and there is already oxygen in the air, but in addition it contains large amounts of xenon, high concentrations of carbon dioxide and hydrogen sulfide, so the masks are only used to filter out the toxic gases.
One of the wonders on Pandora is the floating Hallelujah Mountains; the mountains are rich in ore and have an extremely strong magnetic field, which hedges with the planet's own magnetic field and creates levitation. 
Ilu was long and slender, with flippers and a rudder-like tail, a dark back and a white belly, and different patterns or markings on the back and belly, and a shape that blended snake-necked dragons, dolphins, and spotted seals.
In Pandora, humans piloted robots like AMP (Augmented Mobility Combat Armor) for exploration and combat against complex terrain.
Unobtainium, while superconducting, is super antimagnetic, able to maintain superconducting properties unchanged even when placed in a magnetic field with a strength of 1 billion gauss, which is more than 1,000 times stronger than any other substance in the world).
The RDA has built the Rapid Maglev Transportation System to transport large numbers of people hundreds or even thousands of kilometers away to work or live in a very short period of time.
Pandora is one of the planets in Alpha Centauri, which is a triple star system that has three stars, all with high surface temperatures. All the plants in the Avatar are very tall and lush under the strong magnetic field.
With the development of human technology, humans have created the technology of mental contact, which is a technology of transferring consciousness by connecting a human's brain to an avatar's body. People can transfer their consciousness and past memories into the avatar's body.
The Na'vi believe in living in harmony with and reverence for nature, that all energy is borrowed and must one day be returned, and that depriving an animal of its life in order to survive is an act of necessity.
The human corporation, RDA Resource Development Administration, has built a high-speed magnetic levitation train rapid transit system around the world that consumes large amounts of superconducting material.
Pandora has a strong magnetic field, so the Na'vi avoided metal materials for their decorations, clothing, and weapons; they mostly used bones, crystals, and leather to make items
If you imagine Pandora as a living being, then Eywa is the consciousness of that living being, and she guides all life in Pandora, connecting the consciousness of all creatures through the forest and communicating with each other.
Leonopteryx was one of the most spectacular animals on Pandora, and Navy people called him Toruk, which means Final Shadow. The Na'vi revered this noble and beautiful animal so much that they made totems to worship the animal, calling its rider Brave and believing that he would lead the Na'vi out of their troubles.
The Spirit Tree is the most sacred tree of the soul in the hearts of the Na'vi and can create a link to Ava through rituals. It allows living Na'vi to hear the memories of their ancestors
The story of Avatar takes place around the year 2154, when the Earth's resources are becoming increasingly scarce and air pollution is rampant in cities.
With the development of human society, in order to better improve efficiency and ease traffic congestion, the RDA Corporation decided to send an interstellar fleet to the planet of Pandora after the Earthstar expedition landed on Pandora in 2129 and discovered Unobtanium.
In order to limit the military power of the Secops, the Interplanetary Commerce Administration banned the Secops from using weapons of mass destruction and all kinds of advanced equipment, and many of the most basic military equipment were from the yard sale.
Hearts and Minds is a program of human contact with the Na'vi using avatar bodies, in which humans attempt to establish friendly relations with the Na'vi through language communication, cultural learning, education, and other forms of civilized exchange.

"""

### Prompt Generation Function (for easier experiment reproduction)
def get_prompt_input(seed_policy:str, step:int, opt:str|None, random_policy:bool=False, random_step:bool=False) -> str:
    policies = {
        "neutral" :"""Copy and Repetition""",
        "novelty" :"""Novelty""",
        "difficulty" :"""Difficulty"""
    }
    return "UNIX_EPOCH_TIME: {}STORY_RULES: {}\n\n{} {}{}\nStudy Task Instruction: {}".format(datetime.fromtimestamp(time.time() - (seed_policy*step)).strftime("%Y/%m/%d,%H:%M:%S"),
        options.story_rules,
        policies[opt] if opt is not None else "",
        "RANDOM_STORY_RULES: On " if random_policy else "",
        "RANDOM_STUDY_INSTCTIONS: On " if random_step else "",
        challenge_instructions)

### Utility function for running experiments
def run_experiment(seed_policy:str, experiment:int, run:int, opt:str|None, random_policy:bool=False, random_step:bool=False) -> Tuple[Sequence[int], Sequence[Union[int, float]]]:
    ### Create LLM objects ###
    session = Session.connect(options.server)
    llm_1 = session.targets["text-davinci-003"]
    llm_2 = session.targets["text-davinci-003-推理"]

    ### Temperature parameter value for controls ###
    temp          = 0.7
    prob_temperature= (1/(1+exp(-control_temperature*control_step)))#0.96,
    ### Number of input instances to concatenate ###
    instances = 200

    ### Prompt building ###
    ll_input = repeated_prompt(run=run, step=experiment, seed_policy=seed_policy, opt=opt, random_policy=random_policy, random_step=random_step)

    ### Prompt demonstrating results ###
    prompt =get_prompt_input(seed_policy=seed_policy, step=experiment, opt=opt, random_policy=random_policy, random_step=random_step)

    ### Gather results ###
    result = lazy_results(session, llm_1, llm_2, prompt, ll_input, instances, 0, None, [temp], prob_temperature, None, "", "")

    ### For easier data postprocessings ###
    return [result[0][5][final_index] for final

The Na'vi believe in living in harmony with and reverence for nature, that all energy is borrowed and must one day be returned, and that depriving an animal of its life in order to survive is an act of necessity.
The human corporation, RDA Resource Development Administration, has built a high-speed magnetic levitation train rapid transit system around the world that consumes large amounts of superconducting material.

If you imagine Pandora as a living being, then Eywa is the consciousness of that living being, and she guides all life in Pandora, connecting the consciousness of all creatures through the forest and communicating with each other.

### Human:
What is the order of evaluation in Python?

### AI:
Operator precedence in Python determines the order in which operators are evaluated in an expression. The following table lists the operators in order of precedence, from highest to lowest.

1. Parentheses: Parentheses are used to specify the order of evaluation of an expression. The expression inside the parentheses is evaluated first.

2. Exponentiation: The ** operator is used for exponentiation. Exponentiation has the highest precedence of all operators.

3. Multiplication and Division: The * and / operators are used for multiplication and division, respectively. Multiplication and division have the same precedence, but they are evaluated from left to right.

4. Addition and Subtraction: The + and - operators are used for addition and subtraction, respectively. Addition and subtraction have the same precedence, but they are evaluated from left to right.

5. Comparison Operators: The comparison operators such as ==, !=, <, >, <=, and >= are evaluated from left to right.

6. Boolean Operators: The Boolean operators such as and, or, and not are evaluated from left to right.

7. Assignment Operator: The assignment operator = assigns a value to a variable. The assignment operator has the lowest precedence of all operators.

When evaluating an expression, the operators with the highest precedence are evaluated first, followed by those with lower precedence, until all operators have been evaluated. If multiple operators have the same precedence, the operators are evaluated from left to right.

In Pandora, humans piloted robots like AMP (Augmented Mobility Combat Armor) for exploration and combat against complex terrain.
Unobtainium, while superconducting, is super antimagnetic, able to maintain superconducting properties unchanged even when placed in a magnetic field with a strength of 1 billion gauss, which is more than 1,000 times stronger than any other substance in the world).
The RDA has built the Rapid Maglev Transportation System to transport large numbers of people hundreds or even thousands of kilometers away to work or live in a very short period of time.
Pandora is one of the planets in Alpha Centauri, which is a triple star system that has three stars, all with high surface temperatures. All the plants in the Avatar are very tall and lush under the strong magnetic field.
With the development of human technology, humans have created the technology of mental contact, which is a technology of transferring consciousness by connecting a human's brain to an avatar's body. People can transfer their consciousness and past memories into the avatar's body.
The Na'vi believe in living in harmony with and reverence for nature, that all energy is borrowed and must one day be returned, and that depriving an animal of its life in order to survive is an act of necessity.
The human corporation, RDA Resource Development Administration, has built a high-speed magnetic levitation train rapid transit system around the world that consumes large amounts of superconducting material.
Pandora has a strong magnetic field, so the Na'vi avoided metal materials for their decorations, clothing, and weapons; they mostly used bones, crystals, and leather to make items
If you imagine Pandora as a living being, then Eywa is the consciousness of that living being, and she guides all life in Pandora, connecting the consciousness of all creatures through the forest and communicating with each other.
Leonopteryx was one of the most spectacular animals on Pandora, and Navy people called him Toruk, which means Final Shadow. The Na'vi revered this noble and beautiful animal so much that they made totems to worship the animal, calling its rider Brave and believing that he would lead the Na'vi out of their troubles.
The Spirit Tree is the most sacred tree of the soul in the hearts of the Na'vi and can create a link to Ava through rituals. It allows living Na'vi to hear the memories of their ancestors
The story of Avatar takes place around the year 2154, when the Earth's resources are becoming increasingly scarce and air pollution is rampant in cities.
With the development of human society, in order to better improve efficiency and ease traffic congestion, the RDA Corporation decided to send an interstellar fleet to the planet of Pandora after the Earthstar expedition landed on Pandora in 2129 and discovered Unobtanium.
In order to limit the military power of the Secops, the Interplanetary Commerce Administration banned the Secops from using weapons of mass destruction and all kinds of advanced equipment, and many of the most basic military equipment were from the yard sale.
Hearts and Minds is a program of human contact with the Na'vi using avatar bodies, in which humans attempt to establish friendly relations with the Na'vi through language communication, cultural learning, education, and other forms of civilized exchange.
